name: European Steel Tube Association
goal:
ESTA represent the interests of the National Steel Pipe Association and consequently of nearly all producers of steel pipes in the EU. ESTA mission is:
1. to obtain and disseminate information on matters considered of interest within the Industry ;
2. to promote the efficiency of and the exercise of enterprise and initiative by the Industry ;
3. to promote the interests of the EU industry in the international market ;
4. to represent the Industry on all matters linked with the Customs Regulations, and to act on its behalf in any event of unfair trade ;
5. to keep the European Commission advised of the needs of the Industry ;
6. to respond, on behalf of the members, to any question from the EU Commission on matters of general interest to the Industry ;
7. and generally to represent the Industry in any and all contacts with the EU Commission.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Trade Defence Instruments
Modernization of the Trade Defence Instruments (MTDI)
Market Economy Status
Green goods
